title: Debate on present situation within next two days
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); MP Prasanna Ranatunga says that the Parliament will debate on the present situation in the country on Wednesday (6) and Thursday (7).
The Parliament was adjourned earlier than scheduled today (5), and will reconvene at 10:00 a.m. tomorrow (6).
IMF monitoring political & economic developments in SL very closely – Report
